website_summaries.verdict: This versatile ab roller comes with a lifetime money-back guarantee while helping to build stronger abdominals and burn calories.
pros: Durable stainless steel and nonslip rubber and PVC
Handles have padded foam inserts, minimizing injury
Comes with an additional knee pad, a nutrition ebook, and Ultimate Abs Workout ebook
cons: Roller wheel is narrow, creating tension on wrists

website_summaries.verdict: This nonslip wheel gives you a great workout on any floor type.
pros: Wide wheel with large diameter keeps larger knuckles off the floor
Nonslip rubber wheel securely grips any floor type
Wheel is made of strong stainless steel, nonslip rubber, and durable PVC
Handles made of comfortable EVA foam

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy. Grips hold it on. See pics.
customer_reviews.text: Good wheel. Seems hefty. The rubber edge seems very good and sturdy and can be used on all kinds of flooring. The bar that you hold into is sturdy and the grips are nice and soft... But not too soft. The reason for the 1 star shortfall is because the only thing holding the wheel on is the grips. So they can somewhat move off a bit as you see in the pics. Not so sure how others hold the wheel on but on this if the grips go bad there's nothing to hold it centered. Just fyi.
customer_reviews.author: McMeekin

customer_reviews.title: Its an ab roller, just buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: My core is fairly weak so even after some simple use of this my abs were sore for the next few days. Im pretty excited about incorporating this regularly into my workouts. Easiest thing I've ever assembled and it came with a few bonus items (didnt pay much attention to what I was buying but an added bonus none the less). Works as you would expect, nothing missing or anything I would change or add to it. And the seller is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nate

customer_reviews.title: Seeing and experiencing good results ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built and economical compared with others. Item works as advertised: after using for 1.5 months every (other) day doing 20 revs, my stomach muscles are getting transformed. A large muscle mass is now visible right below my rib cage above my stomach! I am starting to see 6-pack "outline" even with my mini pot belly! Additionally, I can feel tightening in my bicepts that feels very good. I should mention additional stamina is now experienced during private times, especially missionary (to say the least) - feels like I get extra boost from my core area to keep going lol. I definitely plan on using daily especially that the initial muscle pain is gone. Loving the product!
customer_reviews.author: RDUMan

customer_reviews.title: Well with the price
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and very sturdy. I like the rubber traction on it. Others just have hard plastic on the edge so it slips. This rubber makes it easier to use the roller anywhere, especially with the foam knee pad. I took it to work and we can use it on the tile floors in our office without a problem. The knee pad is great even on tile. Came with two comprehensive eBooks - one for nutrition, add the other an instruction guide. Gives great instruction on proper use so you don't hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Applebreze

customer_reviews.title: The rubber surface on the wheel does a good job of not sliding around even on the concrete ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it feels kind of strange to be giving a testimonial for something that causes serious discomfort, but since that is the ab wheel's purpose I guess I will. The rubber surface on the wheel does a good job of not sliding around even on the concrete floor of our garage. Assembly was easy and for the short time I have had it the ab wheel's grips have proven secure and non-slip. For the price this thing is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Ive used it a few times and dont feel like im getting an ab workout
customer_reviews.text: Ive used it a few times and dont feel like im getting an ab workout...more like an arm workout. *update: the company actually offered to refund my money since the item didn’t work out for me. It’s good to see a company stand by customer satisfaction. Even though the product didnt work out for me, I would still suggest buying from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular ab-roller because it was advertised to come with access to 2 e-books. Clicking on any of the links (for the e-books) takes you to a new webpage that indicates “Not Found” and below that message indicates “error 404”. This means that the server that the e-books are supposed to be is either off line or don’t even exist, or that the e-books don’t exist. I’ve emailed the company and am waiting for a response. Bottom line - If you don’t mind being lied to or mislead, well, the ab-roller rolls. If you’re like me, and don’t appreciate dishonest or misleading advertising, don’t buy this ab-roller.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I had surgery on my Achilles Tendon and was bummed about not being able to go to the gym for the next few weeks. This product is perfect for this purpose as I don't need to put any pressure on my foot while it's in the cast and it gets the job done - Super easy to put together and came just as advertised with all the extra add-ons (i.e. the kneeling mat, the links for the DVD's / instructions, etc.) The wheel itself provides a challenge for all levels (beginner, intermediate, experienced) and creates a burn at all levels. I am extremely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Meade

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality and Very Comfortable Ab Roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product, very sturdy, ergonomic handles, and has a non-slip wheel that works great on both hardwood floors and carpets. The wheel is wide enough and has a large enough diameter that the roller is stable when doing oblique exercises. I work out 5-6 times per week and this ab roller compliments my training well. Item is exactly as described and easy to assemble. Reasonable price, great value; highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Herr

customer_reviews.title: It hurts trying to come back up thanks to the lack of easy rolling. I gave it months to break in ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely could get the rod into the wheel. Wheel only rotates with lots of force. It hurts trying to come back up thanks to the lack of easy rolling. I gave it months to break in but it was still sticking. I threw it into the trash and bought a Perfect Ab Carver. I probably could have tried to add lube/grease and get it working, but honestly I didn't feel like it. This thing was supposed to do one thing -- roll -- and it didn't really do it well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described, I've been using it for about a week now. I have a weak core and it is really working it out. Just using knees for now, I tried to go up on my toes and it's NOT happening...baby steps haha
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My abs have never looked better. Able to tone up quickly and noticed the changes after a few days of consistent use. I use this in conjunction with my current workout.
customer_reviews.author: James E Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great ab roller
customer_reviews.text: Great ab roller. The price is awesome considering that sometimes equipment like this can be overpriced. It came with a knee pad which I wasn't expecting which was a nice surprise because that can be the downside of using equipment like this if you don't have a mat at home to use. The wheel itself it well made and sturdy. I've used ones before where I'm worried that the handles are going to snap off and this isn't like that at all. It's incredibly durable. Nice purchase if you're tired of doing crunches and want to switch up your exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: DorothyZ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap all the way around.
customer_reviews.text: There are better ab wheels for the price. Handles are made of thin foam.
customer_reviews.author: Macp1984

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick ab workout and a sense of well being.
customer_reviews.text: This ab wheel is just what I was looking for. Super easy to assemble in less than a minute (three parts). Well made and comfortable to grasp in the exercise position. Back and forth motion feels very stable when using it. The abs tighten as soon its starts to move along the floor. Easy to transport and seems to never be in the way. Have used it for just three days and can feel the abs tightening already. With regular use and watching the diet, it can give the results. Great price point. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Peter DP

customer_reviews.title: So happy that i decided to buy
customer_reviews.text: Have only had 2 days but I'm hooked. I have extremely weak core but I have been using the roller as much as I could several times the past 2 days and this morning I was excited at the improvements I have made. I work out daily now I look forward to the changes my body will start to make after using the roller. Excellent price and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What could go wrong?
customer_reviews.text: Hesitant to write this review because what could possibly be wrong with this item? There is an awful chemical/oil being used in the foam area of the handles, guess its to make the foam spin when you use it. Initially I did not experience it but once you really start using this it gets all over your hand and literally cannot get it off with soap. It smells so strong! I have to use hand sanitizer and shower. The first time I noticed it I accidentally got it in my mouth/face. Do not feel comfortable using it now. Might just wrap the handles with plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great little workout device
customer_reviews.text: This simple, solidly-built, little device puts your core through a good workout. It takes some getting used to... start slowly and gradually work your way farther in subsequent reps/series (you'll feel the pull, so pay attention and roll back before you hurt yourself). Even with less than half a minute's worth of reps, you can feel the burn if you're using your abs to keep yourself from going too far and to pull back. Other supporting muscles get some work too, like the forearms, triceps, shoulders, lats, quads, and hamstrings. I give this a high thumbs up. The 5th star would require a thicker, better-padded knee rest, but that's a bit nit-picky of me.
customer_reviews.author: HecsBox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent exercise equipment for anyone in the family
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I got it for me (petite 5’0 mom), then my large build 6’0” husband sees it along with my teen son and my preteen son and all 3 borrow to see how easy it was. They quickly learned it was challenging in all the way an exercise piece should be. Then they started to compete. I now have them all interested in borrowing moms ab roller to build their abs! I call that a win for me and the rest of my family! Simple to use, strong enough for the biggest member in our family and helps us each at our varying skill levels.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Do not underestimate this little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it might be a good tool for my core workouts and man did it teach me how poor my core was! This little product is an a**-kicker. Do not think it’s going to be easy. The simple (great) instruction manual shows you how to use it as a beginner and the simplest steps to using or as an intermediate then advanced tool to help with core workouts. My only suggestion for improving it is that the tread of the wheel be level so it doesn’t wobble. Really glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: JH -Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: ouch
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know what I was thinking. This 59 year old who wants to get in shape really had no business buying this. I get as far as holding the wheel and then can't move. I did use it to roll out pie crust, but didn't really work well for that either. I do like the knee pad thingy, since it prevents me from just falling flat on my stomach and not being able to get up at all. On the bright side, my 20 and 18 year olds couldn't do it either, but have made progress, so I am giving it a 5 for the boys sake.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Underestimate the Wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I have ab routine I do regularly. It’s very repetitive so I bought this thing. Holy cow. This thing made me sore & I never get sore. I felt it the most in my obliques and lower stomach. This is the real deal but make sure you arch your back upwards and focus on using your stomach. With correct posture, you can add some weight plates in a backpack and get a even more killer workout using this wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality. Honest product. Amazing Cust. Servc.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how solid and cleanly designed this product is. For the price, this is the best Ab Roller-Wheel out there. Besides the ones that have the 'Prop. 65 Warning' that deterred me from continuing my purchase, so I chose Fitnessery because of it's superb quality, un-misleading display amd advertising, and also the fantastic customer serivce and additional bonuses (Workout online book and Diet book for free) that they email in addition to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Essential and invaluable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this twice a week since I got it and I feel improvements everywhere, starting with my grip strength. There was a learning curve for me as I’ve never used one before but there are tons of videos. Always use your best judgment, go SLOW and don’t quit. I do 3 sets of 10 SLOW, (and I haven’t tried the sideways move yet, only straight out and back) but when I started it was 6 sets of 5 with a LOT of gasping in between. Don’t quit!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: If you have never used this, DO NOT START AT LEVEL - 4 expert like I attempted. I thought I was keeping my back straight as instructed but was ultimately was “sagging” at the waste line when doing the knee-less rolls and pinched a nerve in my back but will be fine tomorrow. Im 34 and havent worked out in 10 years after drinking a lot of beer. I used to be a captain of my football team and lead workouts daily. I havent felt my abs have this great of a burning feel and the soreness on my abs shows me im burning fat. Miss that feeling. Best product thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe everything advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Product advertised to include 2 free e-books. After receiving the ab wheel, tried to download the books as instructed by the card inside only to find they don't exist. Will stay away from this brand for any future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Holly O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it I was sore for 3 days --- it really hit the abs. Just make sure you arch you back properly to isolate the abs before you roll forward. Hold the starting position until you feel the abs being stretched before you roll forward. Don't pay more for a different product when this more affordable one will do the trick. Easy to assemble. Knee pad is quite sufficient for knee comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorReview

customer_reviews.title: MY CHOICE !
customer_reviews.text: I read a bazillion reviews, watched a gazillion videos and chose this one. Why? First of all, it is a one wheeler, which forces you to execute balance and strength simultaneously. A two wheeler is more forgiving in that regard. Balance and strength should be developed simultaneously IMO in order to perfect the exercises one can perform with this tool. Rugged? Oh yeah, that it is. Simple to assemble? Yes. 15 seconds. You will not need another if used properly. So BUY it.
customer_reviews.author: Doc McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase! I am not one for working out at all. I just started getting into it having only ever gone for walks/hiking before. After getting into a pretty bad car accident it all stopped and now I've been slowly building back up to get some of that core strength back. This isn't hard on the back like sit ups/crunches are but gives a great work out! The ebooks give other great ab workouts too which have been really helpful with trying to get back to it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Plan and simple, it works. I workout six days a week and was looking for an ab roller to compliment my training, this product fits the bill perfectly. This is a quality product, very sturdy, ergonomic handles and has a non slip wheel that works great on both hardwood floors and carpets. You could go and buy one of those "as seen on TV" ab rollers for twice the money. Save your money and buy this one, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steve375

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Been using everyday since I opened the box and this ab-wheel is really well made. No frills: just a wheel, a handlebar, and two pads. Exactly what one wants! No auto recoil or anything - this is meant to work your core hard with every single extension. Works rear dealts, lats, and lower back too! Great addition to the gym bag or at-home setup!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with their professionalism
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the professionalism of the seller - Fitnessery. They emailed me shortly after the purchase and before the delivery to give me the links to the e-books and asked that I contact them if there was any problem with the delivery or set up (pretty easy to put together - even a 60 year-old can do it). Even more surprising was the packaging; instead of a plastic bag or non-de script cardboard box, the roller came in a very professional-looking colored and printed box. I haven't used the roller yet but I did put it together and tested it out briefly and it's exactly what I was looking for. This appears to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A solid way to train your core at home.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking into getting an ab wheel for a while now, and I'm glad I picked this one. The first time I used it, my lower abs were sore for 2 days afterwards. I'd recommend starting with low reps if you're new to lower ab training. The wheel is pretty wide, so I had no issue with staying balanced while using it. I noticed some other reviews said the foam handle was hard to put on, but I didn't really have a huge problem with it. If you're having trouble with it, I recommend twisting the handle while pushing down as you put it on. Also, the knee pad is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy product and it is great that it comes with a knee mat as well so that it can be used pretty much anywhere. You assemble the device by sliding the metal bar through the hole in the center of the wheel. There is a rubberized sleeve already on one half of the bar and you have to slide on the other rubberized sleeve which effectively locks the bar in place. I have to say it was extremely difficult to get this second sleeve on.This makes it difficult if you want to dismantle the wheel and pack it in luggage if you go away.
customer_reviews.author: Don P.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this ab roller. Simple, durable, just what I needed. I actually really like the knee pad that comes with it. Based on other reviews, I wasn't expecting much, but it flattened out easily and does a surprisingly great job protecting my knees. I use it for other exercise/stretch activities, too. And I wasn't sure what to expect with the added e-books, but they are definitely a very nice free addition! The only thing to be aware of is assembly—it was very challenging to get the handle padding on (just takes some perseverance and patience).
customer_reviews.author: John Mc

customer_reviews.title: Good knee pad.. smooth roller..
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it's not as easy to control as a larger wheel... But size of wheel is good enough.. just slightly hard enough to use muscles to keep the balance... Knee pad is essential, with a roller like this.. and it comes with a knee pad that's very useful... I would like it if the knee pad was slightly thicker, but it's good enough... This is a purchase I'm very happy with, after about a month time using it... I love this.. great for abbs... A must have product if you like to exercise...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cole

customer_reviews.title: I hate this ab wheel, in the best way!
customer_reviews.text: 5'10 220 lb male first time using an ab wheel. This one is sturdy, the wheel grip really grips the living room carpet so i feel stable doing the exercise. Assembly is literally one step. The knee mat is handy as well. I havent used an ab roller with curved handles but i can see how that would be helpful. After doing a few reps you might feel a strain on your wrists and shoulders (due to the nature of the exercise), but that could very easily just be because i am new to the workout and need to develop strength in these areas. If you have any shoulder injuries stay away from this exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought one of these sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: This little workout wheel is awesome. It is sturdy and just as described. I would suggest looking @ YouTube to ensure your form is correct but once you get going its awesome. I do 60 reps each night while winding down watching tv and I've only had this a couple months and I'm starting to see nice definition in my abs- I've never seen something work so quickly workout related. If you are on the fence- you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NETTY12

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, I bought this when I started working out. The one mistake I made was overdoing it the first time. I was sore for about 5 days. Start with other ab exercises first!!! DO NOT USE THIS when you first start working out, or if you are starting to work out after a long time break. I do about 15 reps per day, and its enough. It's really important to make sure you are doing it correctly to avoid injuring yourself. I would definitely suggest watching a youtube video before you use it to make sure you are doing it correctly
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: An absolute nightmare with assembling
customer_reviews.text: I usually prefer not to put bad reviews, but this one is different. I’ve just got the box and have been trying to assemble it for more than 30-35 minutes. Haven’t done with assembling but my hands are already in pain. The product itself seems to be durable, but absolutely a nightmare while assembling. Would advise you to choose a practical and easy one.
customer_reviews.author: Gulnar Bakhishova

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected. Was looking for Bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I would probably and should probably give this 5 stars if i was looking to order this. I made a mistake. I guess i didntvread carefully enough. Had thought this would be twice the size. I think I will have to give this one away once I buy a POWER wheel. I think the power wheel was more what I was looking for so i could also put my feet on it and roll it out.
customer_reviews.author: Artsyzeal

customer_reviews.title: Great Ab Roller
customer_reviews.text: My first ab roller. WOrks very well. Only a few minutes each day on the carpet makes my tummy feel it got a bit of a work out. I'm noticing a bit of difference in the mirror. A pair of pushup thingies and this is all you need for an ad hoc workout before the shower. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. 200LB male did not bend or ruin the tool when used daily. Grips well on Carpet, Grips a little too well on yoga mats. Only issue was putting on or installing the hand grips. Took me longer than my workout. Overall I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Have to ASSMEBLE IT YOURSELF, does not roll in perfectly straight line
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together but you DO HAVE TO ASSEMBLE IT YOURSELF. Mine always pulls a little to the left when I rock on it and use it, which is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Aks

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE IT'S BRAND NEW
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is usable and the exterior shipping box from Amazon was completely intact ... however ... the BOX holding the wheel roller was: (1) all ripped open, (2) most of the contents of the box had fallen out, and (3) the roller wheel was partially put together. REALLY?!?
customer_reviews.author: LadyJulesMW

customer_reviews.title: Get this ab roller.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good an roller. I almost went with a slightly higher priced ab roller but was weary because of the reviews. I kept seeing this one about how simple, effective, reliable it is. It did not disappoint. I'm between 210-215 and it holds up well. On top of that, it rolls incredibly smooth on either carpet or hardwood floor. Works well, gives you a great work out, value price. Forget the higher priced or even the lower prices. This one will work. Five stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well but makes a squeaking noise
customer_reviews.text: This ab roller works just fine. The grips are comfortable, the wheel is an appropriate size, and overall it feels stable when I use it. Only complaint is that the roller "bearing" is just plastic on plastic. I imagine a plastic axle rubbing against a plastic housing will wear out or warp over time with heavy usage. This sometimes causes a faint squeaking noise reminiscent of styrofoam or fingernails on a chalkboard, which is unpleasant. I'm normally blasting music when I exercise so not a huge issue. For a cheap plastic assembly, I feel that the price should be lower.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vandevoorde

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Simple and sturdy ab roller, unlike some of the more gimmicky options available. This one has a stainless steel bar running through the center, so it won't break easily and will support a significant amount of weight. The wheel has a nice rubber coating. The grip was easy to slide on, unlike other products out there. Also came with a pad for the knees, which was similar to a mini yoga mat. Highly recommend this one for those looking to add some home exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: The only exercise gear I'm temtped to call "cute"
customer_reviews.text: Regular sit-ups are a killer for my back, and the benefit of this ab roller is it works the core a lot better. I don't go all crazy with it. The reviews where people are like, "I overextended and face-planted when my arms collapsed"? Make sure your core is plenty stable before going full-on testosterone. Build up to it. And also watch some YouTube videos on how to use an ab roller because I was doing it completely wrong.
customer_reviews.author: One voracious reader

customer_reviews.title: Works As Intended
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s intended to do. Rolls smoothly. One thing I will nitpick about is that the knee pad included with it is slotted instead of completely covered which leaves less room for your knees and makes it more delicate since the handle portion is so thin. It would have been better for the user and probably cheaper to manufacture if the pad was completely whole. I find that I have to use it offset for it to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used to own an ab roller machine which did the job but was so bulky, had a resistance band so it would assist you but this is for serious people only! Haha I love this It’s simple; a wheel and two bars. I use this a few times a week and it’s holding up great! ZERO complaints about the quality. The only thing I wish this had that my other machine had was easily detachable bars so I could quickly put this in my gym bag and quickly assemble it at the gym when I have my ab day. So for now, this is just for my home use but again, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: My father used what we called a "wheelie" for most of his life. I picked up in his footsteps and bought a similar product. When I saw this reasonably-priced alternative, I decided to give it a try. The wheel is wider and more flexible meaning you can move in arcs instead of a straight line. It is very solid and well-built. You could probably weigh 600 pounds and still not break the Ab Roller. Good show!
customer_reviews.author: SteveG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can rate is the seller, as I could not use this. Not just as a beginner, but I also had a few health issues with my abdominal area already so it was impossible for me to try this more than once before I gave myself an injury, but I admit it was my fault for trying. The seller was extremely helpful and understanding, they deserve all 5 stars for standing behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: palindromes

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty good until I realized after 2 weeks that it was the culprit scuffing up my hardwood floors - OVER MY YOGA MAT. I know I don't have special floors so I'm not sure why folks say it did nothing to their floors. I really loved the roller until I realized yesterday what it had done. Hopefully, I can get all the scuffs out. Just don't understand how it damaged the floor and I roll it over my yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: TK NY

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: It caused severe lumbar pain after just a few days so I gave it to Goodwill Industries.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Looking for something simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have treadmills and an eliptical in the basement and do lots of outdoor walking and jogging, but wanted to up my Abs exercises and upper body workouts. This was inexpensive and looks like it has some flexibility in use, so got it. I've only had it a few days, but it assembled easily and is sturdy for me (6 ft, 173 lb). So far, very happy using this every other day for ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bywayz

customer_reviews.title: The grip is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy enough, but the second grip, which you have to install yourself, is basically impossible to put on on mine. And if you don't get the grip completely on, the wheel can easily slide laterally and throw you off balance. I've tried putting water on the rod and have been putting my entire weight onto sliding the grip on, and still can't get it all the way on. I expected a core workout, not an awkward grip workout.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It's a wheel with two handles.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what it looks like. There's nothing catastrophically wrong with its construction, and there's no more to it than meets the eye in general, so I can't imagine anyone coming into it with exorbitant expectations. I also can't see being deeply in love with this thing and hated it immensely before I ever pressed purchase. Five stars, because I hate it less than I expected to.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on previous reviews but was concerned about the quality because it was on the lower end of the price scale. I was pleasantly surprised first with the packaging and then with how easy it was to assemble. The true test was the sturdiness and if it could support me (I am 6'1", 180 lbs.). It passed every test! I recommend this for anyone who is looking to work on their abs at home and not pay an arm-and-a-leg.
customer_reviews.author: ddclark777

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for wife, her sister & more...
customer_reviews.text: It shipped quickly. Seems reasonably made. Got it for the occupants of the house during quarantine. Wife asked if I thought she was getting fat. Response: Your sister is the swollen one. All is well! Kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: GreatDanes4U

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get grip on
customer_reviews.text: This seems like good quality except that we can’t get the grip all the way on. Still usable, but frustrating to look at.
customer_reviews.author: CaitseyD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I usually use one of these when I’m at the gym. Since quarantine started I haven’t been able to use one :( I had to do regular ab workouts at home which I personally don’t like. I decided to buy my own ab wheel and I’m so happy I did! This specific one is super easy to assemble, it’s sturdy, and makes my workouts at home much more enjoyable. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up & amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been an avid user of the Ab Wheel for years so my familiarity with it allowed for an easy assembling. There is no need for a wrench or screwdriver. It's the easiest setup I've ever done! The axis on the wheel is fluid and moves very smoothly. There is a soft cushion on the handles which makes it easy on the palms. The kneepad that comes with it eliminates the idea of having to use a pillow or mat to kneel on especially if you have to go outdoors. Overall, this is a great bang-for-your-buck accessory guaranteed to sculpt your abs with proper diet!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Omokha

customer_reviews.title: Definitely gives you a great core workout!!!
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 230lb and wanted something simple to workout my core and abs in my home office. I have been using this for few weeks now and definitely feel improvements. I was skeptical first but I was really sore after using it few times. Probably it will take months to do intermediate and more advance moves. It was easy to assemble and the knee pads that comes with is also great. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: sean.diegan

customer_reviews.title: Serious muscle isolation
customer_reviews.text: I remember playing with one of these as a kid so I picked up one to work on tightening the old tummy. I think I jumped right to intermediate extension showing the kids how it works. After less than 10 reps my out of shame stomach has been sore for 3 days. That is some excellent isolation of the muscles. I need to scale back to reality and less extension starting out but this is an excellent stomach muscle strengthening tool.
customer_reviews.author: TxKevin

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I'm 77 years old and though I do body weight exercises, lift weights, and ride an exercise bike I noticed my stomach muscles sere getting flabby. I decided to try an Ab Roller and chose this one base on customer reviews. In three days the underlying musculature in my stomach/abdomen area has firmed up. I recommend this as a necessary accessory for any home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great ab workout! Good buy - sturdy, good handles, no wobble.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used one of these in a long time. Could only do 2 sets as my abs were not ready for this. This has a solid build and did not have the wobble that I was expecting. The handles are comfortable. This came in really nicely packaged, I was a bit impressed. This does the job and appears it will last. I recommend this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Iz

customer_reviews.title: Solid and really exhausts your core!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought one of these years ago. I lift several days a week and have always failed to hit my core as much as everything else. I was looking for an easy way to hit my abs at home in a relatively short amount of time, and this has been perfect. Pretty embarrassed to say I did about five reps after watching a video on the correct form and was unable to use it again for two days because of how sore I was! The bonus mat they give you for your knees while using it is a life-saver, I'm glad I didn't toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The roller was delivered on-time, was easy to install and works well. It seems to be sturdy and built well. I would buy it again. Update: I've been using the roller for a couple of weeks now. I happy to say it has exceeded my expectations. It's well made, works well and gives your core a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: max_smart

customer_reviews.title: Poor form = back injury
customer_reviews.text: You have to be careful with these. The first time I used this I hurt my back, and I'm in good shape. I haven't used it since. On the plus side I use the pad as a kneeling pad now when I'm working outside on my flower beds. Update: Fitnessery offered me a full refund because I didn't like the product. I didn't accept the refund, but I increased my review to four stars based on their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: I train heavy, and perform standing rollouts. The wheel at the gym finally broke after years of use and abuse. Weighing 200+ pounds with the added stress of a standing variation will eventually break most wheels; some sooner than others. The plastic mold seems to more evenly distribute the stress, so it's not putting too much force on the wheel's center, specifically the hole where the steel bar runs through (this is where the cracks began with the one at the gym). This is a solidly constructed wheel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Battista

customer_reviews.title: "Bonus" books didn't come with it :/
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to put together and seems easy enough to figure out, but be warn, the "bonus" books didn't come with it. I chose this product over a different brand because I thought it would come with them, so I'm pretty bummed. I would have appreciated the books to establish a proper workout routine and look more into better dieting :/
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Difficulty Levels Make this Great for a Wide Range of Abilities
customer_reviews.text: It is a little beyond my fitness abilities at the moment to go too crazy on this thing, but I can do five reps from my knees at this point. It glides smoothly, it feels sturdy like it can hold my weight, and I’m sure that as I improve it’s going to work wonders for me beyond what crunches ever could. There is some assembly required but I was able to do it with my bare hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starting Low and Slow
customer_reviews.text: I am 62 years old and worried about my mobility and flexibility as I age. It's been a few years since I last considered exercising, and I imagined the Ab roller would be too much for me. However, I followed the suggestions in the e-book, Ultimate Ab Workouts, and persisted and am now rolling out further and going in three directions to work my abs and obliques. I am still sore the next day, but I am getting stronger. Best of all, I feel more in control of my body now that my muscles are getting stronger which gives me confidence in all other parts of my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: ShknBkVgn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Extremely simple to assemble. I am an out of shape beginner so I rolled it a couple times. It’s not that easy and I could already feel it in my upper body. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Augusta Renee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Solid Roller in $10-20 Range
customer_reviews.text: A little higher friction-harder to roll (in a good controlled way) versus cheaper rollers. The mat is near worthless, very thin and hard, providing a marginal improvement vs a hard floor. Excellent wheel shape-stability, with just a touch of rounding to aid in creating and executing arced paths.
customer_reviews.author: steve stehr

customer_reviews.title: Super Frustrating Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived half-assembled. Fine. But the sleeve for the other side just won't fit on. I've been working on it for an hour and gotten maybe 80% there. I also tried flipping the sleeve over and using the other side of it, but gotten the same results. Maybe that's why someone previously returned this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. Sleeve doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said it was easy to assemble lied. I cannot get the sleeve on so after trying for over 3 hrs I gave up. Next morning I asked my husband and he said yea that’s not going on there. Needless to say I have a brand new item that’s got 80% of the sleeve on. Extremely frustrating to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 seconds to put together, and start using it. My ab's have a long way to go, but this is very stable - the one at the gym is wobbly and hard to find (other area's use it.) This is nice and light, I take it to the gym with me. I'm happy with this purchase, and I'm looking forward to getting good at using it. It' that consistency thing :-)
customer_reviews.author: Robin Forster

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So... My husband had one of these and never used it. So I was purging and got rid of it. You know what happened next. He wanted to know where it was. So I ordered this one to replace that one. Went together very easily and it looks like it will sit on the floor in the bedroom just as well as the other one did.
customer_reviews.author: S. Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed is that the handle grips are what secures the whole thing together. I’m not saying it’s a bad thing, but I’m curious how long it will hold up after many uses. I’ve had mine for about 2 weeks now and works fine so far. Putting it together was a little work, but nothing too bad. If your looking for better quality, spend more money elsewhere, but for the price this thing is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DiGiulio Jr

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, use it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why ppl complain about things so much, I weigh 235 and I’m 6ft tall, heavyweight, this thing is great, no problems with sturdiness or durability, I do 3 to 5 sets every few days, reps of 10-20 depending on how I feel, I’m seeing lots of definition all over my torso, I’ve been using it about 6 weeks, can’t wait to see what happens over the next 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: joseph gamel

customer_reviews.title: Requires strength to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to understand how to assemble, but you need incredible strength to slip on the handles. Thankfully, mine came with one handle on already. I’ve prob spent an hour trying to slide the other one up, bit by bit. BUT, I know that once it’s on, it will be very sturdy. I’m waiting for my bf to come over so he can finish the job 😂
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a little trouble putting the grip into place, I recommend using a dab of dishwasher soap on the bar before putting the grip into place. I also recommend watching a video with a fitness expert doing the exercise to make sure you see the proper technique. This arrived as promised and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RedRockRick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these and used it at work, decided that it worked so well I needed a second to use at home. Easy to use and put together. Glad there is a knee pad with it. I'm an extreme beginner but noticed in a day or so the pain that comes from not using muscles as you should. As of now just using it for a few minutes but hope to expand my usage.
customer_reviews.author: Sabes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and I'm very pleased with the product. The packaging is of high quality and I like the knee pad included with the roller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and stable rolling motion
customer_reviews.text: Have used several times now and found this ab roller to be very smooth and stable. Allows for total focus on proper form and concentration on the muscles being worked. Makes the exercise fun to do and removes any doubt about maintaining control as you extend out and pull back. Very satisfied user!
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: ... an an roller in the past and it worked great. Now I needed a new one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned an an roller in the past and it worked great. Now I needed a new one. Very easy to assemble. Takes about 2-3 minuets to put together. I love it that it came with a knee cushion so you can do it on a concrete and don’t have to worry about sore knees. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T

customer_reviews.title: A Great Overall Experience
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the speed of delivery, the ease of product assembly and use, and the intended challenge offered by the workout. I was also delighted to receive an additional email from the seller offering a workout and nutritional information as added bonuses. A great overall experience!
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Effective
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I honestly can’t speak much for sturdiness because I weigh 105lb., but it has held up just fine. This is my first experience with an ab wheel. It is simple to use and provides a challenge. After a week of non-intense use, I have already felt improvement. I am stronger and see more tone. Being able to start from my feet and roll out all the way is looking like an obtainable goal! I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE**** 1 year later and is still going strong.**** Does what it sets out to do. Very basic and you will have to put all your effort into it. I recommend using a wall as measurement to set a distance. If you're a beginner please be careful. As time goes along and you get stronger distance yourself from the wall until you don't need it anymore. Great product. I intend to use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean Queen

customer_reviews.title: Tough ab workout!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to think I'm in pretty good shape... My first day with the Ab Roller I did 6 sets of 10. The next day I was so sore in muscles I didn't even know I had!! I think this is going to be a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: gkrabbe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality + fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I've used types of ab rollers for many years, but this one is far the simplest and smoothest = 10 stars Also, very fast delivery, arrived a day earlier than projected! Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Effective and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality and the roller exercise is about the most effective core exercise going. I am in my seventies and still find this type of exercise is strenuous yet gentle on old bones and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Yukon John

customer_reviews.title: Nice Roller
customer_reviews.text: I work out everyday & with my schedule sometimes rushed in morning workouts. With this Roller I can buy some time and do Abs @ home. This Roller is good quality, And does the job. Very happy with the purchase. My kids are even into using it (12 & 8)
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: Need some time to set up but ok to use after that
customer_reviews.text: The set up was supposed to be easy. This is an ab roller so it should come ready to be used directly. Instead, one of the sides came unattached and I had to push it the rubber piece hard n slow (see the 4th picture). It took me 10 mins to do this but after this , everything is okay. It is stable enough for my abs exercise so thats okay. I would suggest making this item ready to be used without having any set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jazlie

customer_reviews.title: You will break before this does.
customer_reviews.text: If you are hardcore or want to be... this is the one for you. It's all you baby! You will probably do 75% less reps than with a spring loaded one but that stuff is for the weak. They are also more expensive. Just get it already and become stronger!
customer_reviews.author: ViceP

customer_reviews.title: Will carve a six-pack into your guts, if you've got the stomach for it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm barely strong enough to use this; the first time I tried for less than 10 seconds my belly was on fire for three days! Once I'm worthy (after six months of planks and crunches with a 25-lb plate) I know this thing will finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective cheap Roller
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering I was very excited to order the roller, so order with grace. When the order was delivered did not received the mat and the rubber of roller when received was cracked. Terrible customer service of the Fitnessery made it more horrible and inconvenient for the process of replacement. I would not suggest this roller to others and to take it with a pinch of salt while buying.
customer_reviews.author: RockSV

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple machine. It is well made for the cost. The company does seem to care. Though I ignored their after sale follow-up, I was impressed by that. Use it well and the core will be grateful. Thinking about purchasing it? Do It!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Burton

product_meta.title: Fitnessery Ab Roller for Abs Workout - Ab Roller Wheel Exercise Equipment - Ab Wheel Exercise Equipment - Ab Wheel Roller for Home Gym - Ab Machine for Ab Workout - Ab Workout Equipment
product_meta.description:
Fitnessery Ab Roller - Add To Cart NOW To Enjoy This Ab Fitness Equipment In 48 Hours With Amazon Prime!

With this fitness ab equipment for abs, building a set of abs of steel just became a whole lot easier.

Convenient and easy-to-use. It strengthens your core, burns calories and tones your abdominal. The wheel features non-slip rubber and grips any floor surface. The ab roller wheel is made of stainless steel to ensure long-lasting durability. And features padded handles for a comfortable grip.

Each purchase includes a knee pad and 2 bonus E-books. The E-books are emailed to you after purchase.

Benefits:
✔ Ultra-comfortable hand grips
✔ Strengthens arms and shoulders
✔ Helps sculpt and tone abdominals
✔ Single non-slip rubber wheel design for stable, smooth and fluid movements
✔ Every purchase includes 3 FREE bonuses gifts that you won't find anywhere else! 

Click “Add to Cart” NOW To Train With This Ab Wheel 

Fitnessery Ab Roller Ships Super Quick - Get Started 48 Hours From Now With Amazon Prime.

All Fitnessery Products Come With Life-Time 100% Money-Back Guarantee. If You Have Any Problems With This Ab Roller Wheel Gym Equipment, Simply Ask For A Refund Or Replacement. No Questions Asked.

You Will Receive:
▸ Fitnessery Ab Exercise Wheel
▸ Ergonomically Designed Knee Mat
▸ Life-Time 'No Questions Asked' Money-Back Guarantee
▸ Ultimate Abs Work Out E-book: contains 45 pages of recommended abdominal exercise and home exercises that you can try straight away. Learn the 5 little known secrets to effectively work out your abdominal muscles. You will receive this E-book via email.
▸ Six Pack Abs Nutrition E-book: packed with 90 pages of information rich content on which fad diets to avoid, eating healthy and balanced. Learn how meal frequency, metabolism and the thermic effect of foods can help you get a set of abs. You will receive this E-book via email.
feature_bullets: ★ SCULPT YOUR AB: Fitnessery ab roller acts as your personal fitness trainer - helping you to build stronger and bigger six pack abs, burn calories, build muscle and improve your overall endurance. Your ab roller wheel comes with 3 free bonus gifts and life-time money back guarantee. Add to cart NOW to enjoy this abs cruncher in 48 hours with Amazon Prime.

★ SUPERIOR QUALITY: Train with one of the most effective pieces of home exercise equipment. It is made of strong, durable material to ensure it withstands even the most intense workout sessions. The ab wheel is made of strong stainless steel, non-slip rubber and durable PVC. The abs roller handles are made of comfortable EVA foam padding ensure safety and comfort.

★ 3 FREE BONUS GIFTS: Each purchase includes three incredible extras. 1) A comfortable knee pad for added knee support (value: $10). 2) Six Pack Abs Nutrition E-book (value: $20) for valuable diet, health, and fitness guidance. 3) Ultimate Ab Workout E-book (value: $20) for fitness training workout advice. EXCLUSIVE only to Fitnessery customers, you won’t find these high-value free gifts anywhere else!

★ SAVE MONEY: If you want to save money on a gym membership or need to fit in a fast workout, our ab work out equipment is the ideal gym equipment for home! The non-slip rubber wheel roller securely grips any floor type, and the handles have soft padding for total comfort. It is the perfect training equipment for your home gym!

★ LIFE-TIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: At Fitnessery, the overall health, fitness, and wellbeing of our customers have always been our top priority! To help ensure you receive a home workout equipment that you’re fully satisfied with, we’re offering our life-time risk free guarantee with every purchase.
